column5: While I was out bow hunting (deer),my oldest was out on the river trying out his new float reel for the first time for steelhead. He told me there were a couple of guys out there in the same area with him, and they helpped him with the how too,s with a float reel.He learned alot and was pretty excited with his new reel,once he got the sway of things. Nice to hear theres good out there on the rivers.
Those kinds of people help me keep my faith in the fishing public.
